relation: Love Come Down: The Best of Evelyn Champagne King
written and produced by Jamila Calliope Muse Anderson
DRUMS ETC / LE MUSICIEN QUÉBÉCOIS INC
pageTitle: 10/6/2013: Sistahs Who Rock The Beat | KFAI
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {47294=© KFAI, 1808 Riverside Avenue, Minneapolis, MN 55454 Tel: 612-341-3144}
textBeforeTable: Playlist Tracks:  Sharing musical stylings from West Africa to the Mississippi Delta, Sistahs Who Rock The Beat is about the rhythm that makes you move and the women who provide the beat to make it happen.  Selections feature star drummer Cindy Blackman Santana, violinist Rhiannon Giddens of the Carolina Chocolate Drops, disco queen Evelyn Champagne King and Saint Paul (MN) songbird Ashley DuBose https://www.facebook.com/events/457935737658202/, among many others.  Multi-talented artist Jamila Calliope Muse Anderson stopped by to share what inspires her artistry with host Brenda Bell Brown.  A triple-threat of talent - theatre, song, writing - Jamila is slated for roles in upcoming productions at The Playwrights Center and Theatre Unbound.  Her song "The Show" is a highlight on today's playlist. SISTAHS WHO ROCK THE BEAT Producer/Host: Brenda Bell Brown Special Guest: Jamila Calliope Muse Anderson (photo credit: Michele Spaise) News Volunteer Leila Giannetti Patti Walsh
